name: Video Poker!
description:
Classic Video Poker - Jacks or Better video poker with high or low gamble.

• Real vegas style game play and payout
• High or Low Gamble feature

Poker! has loads of features

• Daily Coins
• Easy and clean game play
• Highscores and leadboards
• High quality graphics
• Game play sync with Facebook

Video Poker is a great game to play for fun as is intended for fun purposes only
